Polygon Mesh Processing¶

Geometry processing: surface reconstruction from point samples, filtering operations for noise removal, geometry analysis, shape simplification, geometric modelling. queries: e.g. p e R3. Is it inside or outside? distance from p to surface http://cgal.org http://openmesh.org http://meshlab.org

3/4 D Planetarium¶

http://www.haydenplanetarium.org/universe/download/ http://www.ted.com/talks/carter_emmart_demos_a_3d_atlas_of_the_universe.html http://virdir.ncsa.illinois.edu/partiview/
